metadata.title: CVE-2017-9274 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A shell command injection in the obs-service-source_validator before 0.7could be used to execute code as the packager when checking RPM SPEC fileswith specific macro constructs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9274` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

osc - 0.162.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: osc package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.162.1-1').
